title: Scrolling Credits
extensionText: Scrolling Credits on Streamer.bot Extensions Wiki

options.name: host
options.label: Host
options.description: The host of the Streamer.bot Websocket server to connect to

options.name: port
options.label: Port
options.description: The port number of the Streamer.bot Websocket server to connect to

options.name: endpoint
options.label: Endpoint
options.description: The endpoint of the Streamer.bot Websocket server to connect to

options.name: secure
options.label: Secure?
options.description: Required when using a tunnel to connect to a remote host. Usually you'll set port to 443 when using this

options.name: password
options.label: Websocket Password
options.description: Password for your Streamer.bot Websocket server if enforcing authentication

options.name: scrollingSpeedPercent
options.label: Scrolling Speed (in percent)
options.description: How fast the credits will scroll

options.name: ignoreThisIterations
options.label: Infinite Iterations?
options.description: Choose whether or not you want to display the broadcaster in the credits

options.name: iterations
options.label: Iterations
options.description: Number of times to play credits

options.name: removeBroadcaster
options.label: Remove Broadcaster?
options.description: Choose whether or not you want to display the broadcaster in the credits

options.name: testCredits
options.label: Play Test Credits
options.description: Use when testing and you want to scroll all possible types of credits

options.name: introImageFirst
options.label: Show intro image above intro text?

options.name: outroImageFirst
options.label: Show outro image above outro text?

options.name: creditsDuration
options.label: Credits Duration (in seconds)
options.description: Choose how long you want the length of the credits to be.

options.name: pixelSpeed
options.label: Pixel Speed
options.description: (Advanced) Choose how long you want the length of the credits to be.
